topic: How to leave out the legend in a falsecolor image
body:
Hi,


A quick. Is it possible to leave out the legend in a falsecolor image and if so how is this done?
Here is my falsecolor call:


falsecolor -i images/Image_DF.hdr -s 10 -n 10 > images/Image_DF_falsecolor_DF.hdr






Best regards


Per
___
